---
category: news
title: "Amid Tesla autopilot probe, 47% people say self-driving cars less safe: Survey"
excerpt: "Seventeen per cent adults believe that autonomous vehicles are as safe as regular cars, up from 8 percent who said the same in 2018..About 28% people had heard nothing about the crashes involving Tesla autopilot while 30% had heard nothing about the federal probe relating to the crashes."
